code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{FavoritesContext}from'../FavoritesContext';import MovieCard from'./MovieCard';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FavoritesPage=()=>{const{favorites,removeFavorite}=useContext(FavoritesContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'30px',backgroundColor:'#fff',borderRadius:'12px',boxShadow:'0 4px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)',maxWidth:'1200px',margin:'0 auto',border:'1px solid #e6e6e6'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{fontSize:'2.5rem',color:'#FF5733',textAlign:'center',marginBottom:'25px',textShadow:'1px 1px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)'},children:"Your Favorites"}),favorites.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{fontSize:'1.3rem',color:'#555',textAlign:'center',padding:'20px',backgroundColor:'#fafafa',borderRadius:'8px'},children:"No favorites added yet."}):favorites.map(movie=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'space-between',padding:'20px',marginBottom:'15px',backgroundColor:'#f9f9f9',border:'1px solid #ddd',borderRadius:'10px',boxShadow:'0 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)',transition:'box-shadow 0.3s ease'},onMouseOver:e=>{e.currentTarget.style.boxShadow='0 6px 14px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)';},onMouseOut:e=>{e.currentTarget.style.boxShadow='0 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)';},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MovieCard,{movie:movie}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>removeFavorite(movie.id),style:{padding:'12px 18px',backgroundColor:'#FF5733',color:'#fff',border:'none',borderRadius:'8px',cursor:'pointer',fontSize:'1rem',transition:'background-color 0.3s',outline:'none'},onMouseOver:e=>e.target.style.backgroundColor='#e64e2a',onMouseOut:e=>e.target.style.backgroundColor='#FF5733',children:"Remove from Favorites"})]},movie.id))]});};export default FavoritesPage;
